body.name: Aveek Wireless Microphone System, UHF Dual Cordless Dynamic Transmitter Microphones Microfono Set, Handheld Karaoke Mic with Receiver for Singing, Speech, Party, Church, DJ, Wedding, 200ft Range
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 15 hrs 7 mins
features: 【Clear and Pristine Sound Quality】High sensitivity dynamic microphone core of each wireless karaoke microphone is specially engineered to limit feedback and interference, picking up sound smoothly and transmitting sound hassle-free. Deliver clear, robust, pure, full, optimal true sound. Ideal for Karaoke, Home KTV, Big party, DJ, Wedding, Class use.

【Professional UHF Karaoke Microphone Wireless System】UHF cordless microphone for singer is less likely to subject to interference than VHF microphone. Reliable signal and no worried about the sound will be cut in and out during use. With long transmission range(60 m/200ft) in open space.

【Beyond-Expectation Wireless Performance】The professional receiver with two rechargeable karaoke microphones has LCD displays showing frequency number, and has individual volume control enabling precise vocal balancing.

【Easy to Use】Plug and play. Just turn on the receiver and wireless mics, they will match automatically. 2 x AA batteries (not included) are required for each DJ wireless mic. The product packaging contains paper instructions, and there is also an electronic manual at the bottom of the detail page, You can follow the instructions.(Note: It is not compatible with laptop, iPad, cellphone and AV receiver.)
【What you get】2 x wireless handheld microphone, 1 x receiver, 2 x anti-slip ring, 1 x 6.35mm audio cable, 2 x mic covers, 1 x manual, 1 x power cord.

Specifications: Pattern: the PLL Debug mode: FM Total channel: 2*48CH Channel spacing: 0.5mHz Frequency stability: ±0.005% Dynamic range:100dB Maximum deviation: ±75KHZ Total signal-to-noise ratio: 105db Total distortion: ≤0.8%

Receiving sensitivity:12dBuV(80dBS/N) Total harmonic distortion: <0.3%(at 1khz) Harmonic interference: ≥50dB Mirror interference: ≥60dB Transmission power: high power 10--mW, low power 3mW Maximum frequency offset: ± 45KHz Signal-to-noise ratio:(S/N): >98dB(A) Distortion: (1kDz): <0.3% Operating temperature:-10℃_55℃ Working distance: 60m(under ideal conditions)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They very good for the price
reviews.reviewText: Look good and sounds great, at a good price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great microphone system set
reviews.reviewText: Great microphone system set. Easy and simple to set up. I love how well these microphones work. We're loving them

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A good, budget-friendly wireless mic option
reviews.reviewText: For most standard applications, this is will be a decent wireless mic set-up. Karaoke, speeches, meetings, PA systems, etc. It should perform well in most of those tasks.For me, my plan was to use it with props as part of my Halloween display - which I have tested and it does do - but I've had to introduce additional equipment like a small mixer and blue tooth transmitters to get it to do exactly what I want.Pros:- Easy to set up- Compact- Good sound and range- Low interference on USF signal- Mics pair automatically- Budget friendlyCons:- Limited audio out options (6mm or 3-pin XLR only)- Must daisy chain a mixer, amp, or receiver ahead of your speakers- No XLR cables included- Battery-operated Mics are not rechargeableSince my use requires concealing electronics and cables as much as possible, the flexibility to aid in doing so becomes all the more important with components like this. It can be done with this system, but I tend to prefer more all-in-one options. For most applications, this kit will be perfectly suitable and will work well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great Karaoke mic
reviews.reviewText: We were looking for a set of wireless mics our church group. But found the a great set of mics that we ended up using for our family trip, for karaoke night.These mics held up to several hours of singing and one or two mic drops. It paired well with our amp and mixer. The sound was smooth and clear. And the mics worked even from a good distance.Overall this was a great purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: nice product good sound but sometimes some noisy sounds come out!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars mic did not work

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not Bad Could be Better
reviews.reviewText: The microphones are nice and work great. The only drawback is they require batteries and are not rechargeable. The Sound is clear. The range is very good. The price is reasonable but wish they were rechargeable. B+

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great budget mics
reviews.reviewText: needed for a small event, didnt go anywhere near the max range, and still had minor little hiccups in reception to the base, admittedly I probably should have raised the base placement for a more ideal location, but for the most part, these worked fine. its a great value and it gives you the ability to have wireless microphones.
